title: Blood War
description: Werewolves—savage and brutal. Isaac controls the pack and lords over the lycanthropic horde with an iron fist. Vampires—ruthless and deadly. Elder Markus governs the regal, fanged brethren of a centuries-old coven. For almost six hundred years, the immortal clans have been sworn blood enemies, locked in vicious conflict within the darkness of the mortal world. But a new threat has arisen, one with the potential to eradicate both species from existence: hybrids, offspring of forbidden unions between werewolf and vampire.Harboring hidden agendas and unforgiveable secrets, will the pure-blooded races be able to unite together to fight their crossbred opponents? Or will bloodlust and history prevent a truce between the vampires and werewolves, allowing their illegitimate children to overpower them to become the most dominant creatures on Earth?
author: Dylan J. Morgan
